net.tfobz.vocabletrainer.gui.panels

Class VocableTrainerNewPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • net.tfobz.vocabletrainer.gui.panels.VocableTrainerPanel
              • net.tfobz.vocabletrainer.gui.panels.VocableTrainerNewPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class VocableTrainerNewPanel
extends VocableTrainerPanel
    VocableTrainerNewPanel is a GUI panel that allows users to create new vocabulary sets, import/export sets, rename or delete existing sets, and add new vocabulary cards. It extends the VocableTrainerPanel and integrates with the main VocableTrainerFrame.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
